Name: Life is Paine
About the game: Life is Paine is a humorous Point and Click Adventure where you play a bard which has lost his voice due to an unfortunate accident and tries to regain it. This Game has numorous interesting riddles and various interesting Characters. Every combination of the Items will produce a different dialoge option or joke. The design is inspired by classic Point and click Adventures from the early 2000ds. This game was developed by Jonas Autenrieth. Every other contributor has worked for free. Without them this project could not have come to fruition.
